Html: Would it be possible to add an undo option to rawr without too much trouble? I keep finding myself switching a piece of gear to fit the gear puzzle together only to want to switch it back and change a different piece in a different slot. An option like this would make manually planning gear priority a lot faster.
Unfortunately, no. An undo feature would indeed be possible, however not without much trouble. It's on our 'nice to have' list at the moment, but is a pretty low priority, due to the effort involved.
